about_the_game:
Synopsis

Charlotte's story has ended. Charlotte's story has begun.

A prologue. An epilogue.

An end. A beginning.

All ended well.

There was nothing to grieve about.

Info

Hello Charlotte: Childhood's End is the final story in the Hello Charlotte series, serving as a prologue and an epilogue to the main plot.

A prosumer noise machine, a virulent insect, an obscene revelation — and an earnest thank you.

Hello Charlotte games:

  • Hello Charlotte EP1 (2015) is a story about a memory of long-gone gods and loss of individuality, where your Puppet's new friend goes missing among the static.

  • Hello Charlotte EP2 (2016) is a story lamenting the impossibility of universal happiness, and idolization of those out of our reach.
    As her mind unravels, ink will flow, and blood-red flowers will bloom in the desolate field.

  • Hello Charlotte: Delirium (2017) is a spin-off minigame made to test some of the RPG Maker features. It's a red herring.

Gameplay & Features

The gameplay of Hello Charlotte features a mix of visual novel-inspired storytelling, exploration and puzzle elements.

  • Solve puzzles!

  • Explore the House!

  • Experience 2 different routes!

  • Get all the achievements!

  • Collect trading cards!

  • Discover new books to read!

  • Talk to the tenants and your beloved classmates!

  • Experience the conclusion to Charlotte's story and uncover the truth!

highlighted.name: See You in My Heavenly Kingdom

content_descriptors.notes: Graphic violence and death, suicide, self-harm, cursing, body horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels desktop resolution
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: "All ended well.There was nothing to grieve about." A farewell, and a greeting.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, French
